subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees’ starting outfielders Hideki Matsui, Johnny Damon and Bobby Abreu will all be 33 by midseason, and they all could use a break now and then. This is where Melky Cabrera comes in.
snippet: Yankees’ starting outfielders Hideki Matsui, Johnny Damon and Bobby Abreu will all be 33 by midseason, and they all could use a break now and then. This is where Melky Cabrera comes in.
